songs.title: Midnight Reflectionsss
songs.story: A nostalgic journey through late-night Tokyo, blending jazz and pop elements.

lyrics_structure.content: [Instrumental Beat: Soft drums with electric piano]

夜の街を歩くたび
心の中に響いている
あの日の光、もう戻らない
あなたの笑顔、まだここにある

Remember the Midnight Days
二度と戻らないの
星の光、遠い記憶
あなたを連れていった

songs.title: Neon Dreams
songs.story: An homage to 80s electronic music, capturing the essence of retro-futurism.

lyrics_structure.content:
Neon lights flicker in the rain
Digital dreams, we're not the same
Cybernetic heart, electric soul
Virtual love takes its toll

In my neon dreams
Nothing's as it seems
Pixelated love, binary code
In this digital world, we call home

songs.title: Samba de Verão
songs.story: A classic bossa nova tune celebrating the joy of Brazilian summers.

lyrics_structure.content:
Samba de verão
Já cantei pra você
Mas esse ano
Meu cantar se fez mais triste

Porque passou
E a gente não viu
O amor que a gente queria
O amor que a gente queria

songs.title: Digital Sunset
songs.story: An exploration of digital nostalgia and the aesthetics of early internet culture.

lyrics_structure.content:
Pixelated memories fade
In the glow of a CRT shade
Windows 95, a digital dream
Nothing is quite as it seems

Digital sunset, fading away
Nostalgia for a bygone day
Vaporwave aesthetics, mall music dreams
Echoes of the past in lo-fi streams

songs.title: Sakura Nights
songs.story: A modern take on Japanese pop, blending traditional elements with electronic beats.

lyrics_structure.content:
桜の花びらが舞う夜に
君と歩いた街角
ネオンサインが輝いて
私たちを包み込む

Sakura Nights, 心躍る
東京の夜に溶け込んで
Sakura Nights, 君と二人
終わらない夢を見てる
